review_title: There are games worse than this...
one_reviews_text:
...but not many. In general I like these Chernobyl Stalker settings. But this game only s*cks. It started with not getting the notes on the floor, because the VR floor was lower than the real one. No resetting or adjusting from inside the game possible.
Than the game itself:
- The whole game is dark gray.
- Nearly no textures.
- Very low detailed models.
- Very close fogging (small visible area).
- Enemies shoot you from the fog.
- Pistol aiming is very bad.
- Very bad driving or flying "physics".
- Grabbing items often grabs the wrong one or nothing (especially durings fights.
- Radiation grows constantly and damages your health.

Maybe some unexperienced VR games will like this, but I will ask for a refund.

review_feedback: Hello. The game is using the height, that you set at Oculus height settings. Maybe you have to recalibrate the height(oculus rift) or the floor level(oculus rift s). Just click 'Set floor position' under Devices --> Configure Rift in the oculus desktop software.
